name: Cookies GDPR
author: Sirius Pro

sections.description:
Simply display cookies popup for GDPR compliance with consent. This plugin allows you to show cookies popup with custom message and consent without modifying the code and it works with most of the available themes. Just install and activate this plugin to add cookies popup for all user.

Read more about this plugin on WordPress blog.
sections.installation:
1. Unzip the cookies-gdrp.zip folder.
  2. Upload the cookies-gdpr folder to your /wp-content/plugins directory.
  3. In your WordPress dashboard, head over to the Plugins section.
  4. Activate Cookies GDPR plugin.

short_description: Simply Simply add content and display cookies popup for GDPR compliance.
